I have played through Half-Life 2 multiple times now and I love it every single time, it is also great fun getting all the achievements.  An amazing blend of story telling, action and puzzle solving all bundled in to one.  This game still looks pretty too, even today! 

If you haven't played HL2 yet, get it and give it a go, it is one of the best games of all time IMO, don't miss out!  But hey, look at it this way, at least HL2 is confirmed! :P

Update Nov 2016: Still f**king amazing

I got this game expecting this 10 year-old game to be overhyped(i was kinda right) but it has alot going for it this being my first time playing, i can see the apeal.

            *Superb use of ingame physics

Cons: *Slightly Outdated graphics

          *No locational damage; EX:Headshots Don't insta-kill Etcetara
          

   Rating:7/10

I can recommend this game to someone who has alot of time on their hands and is getting tired of the same old

В честь 10-летия решил написать объективный обзор данной игры. 
Поиграл я в неё где-то в январе 2005 года. И был приятно шокирован, когда увидел, что моя карточка Nvidia GeForce Ti 4400 (на то время эта карточка была среднячком) выдает такую приятную картинку (даже Doom 3 не поразил мое воображение). 
Собственно, не только графика меня поразила в игре, но и:
-Локации игры (постсоветского государства, Ревенхольм и т.д.)
-NPC (начиная с существ из Зена и заканчивая армией Альянса)
-Физика "тряпочной куклы" (Ragdoll-физика)
-Наличие оружия как Gravity Gun
-Завораживающий сюжет 
-Очень понравилось наличие транспорта в игре (в том числе и которым можно управлять)
-Приятный OST
И многое другое. Просто всё не вспомнишь сразу.
Итог: 10/10

I can say, along with the rest of the gaming community, this game is a pure masterpiece.

With a gripping storyline, characters that you will grow to know and love, and none of that "oh, that's a convinently located ______ that will help me finish this mission" cliche that you see in lots of modern *cough*squareenix*cough* games. 

To follow the perfection Valve has given the game is a modding community, striving to repeatedly revive the game and its interest.

Half -Life 2 is a masterpiece. Buy it NOW!

Why do you, play games? I dont know, maybe because HALF LIFE 2 CHANGED MY LIFE! half life 2 has everything a good game SHOULD have. it has a good storyline (easier to understand if you played the first one), good weapons, good fluent change of enemies, and finally good characters. Hands down this is a great game and if you dont have it, get it. This game also runs great on shitty laptops so good gaming for everyone!

В общем, скажу честно, в эту игру я сыграла только в этом году (2015))), и она действительно классная, бегаешь по локации с ломиком, думаешь как попасть в нужное место, попутно отбиваясь от врага унитазом, куча разнообразного оружия и устройств. Можно сказать, что HF2 одна из лучших игр прошедшых лет.  Даже не могу представить, как от неё офигивали в 2004г, особенно от графики)))

This might be hard to believe, but this man is the leader of a group of lizards from the hyper elite. I know this first hand. I took care of this being as the mentor, as I am a hyper elite of the syntax-sector of the Illuminati. I have experimented with teleportation, Obama, and lizards shape-shifting into Secret-service agents. When the syntax-sector of the hyper elite barracks in the north pole, most experiments broke loose. This prototype, however, was smarter than most. With little to no signs of lizard-like structures when shape-shifted, he was the perfect man for our job. I once used my transformation powers, but was quickly spotted, and the extra-molecular shape-shifting superdinosaur came and saved me, with the hyperbeam harvested from Dialga in the Pokemon dimension. Yes, that show is real, made by the Ancient Gods from Sector-B//AnimationDimension//X-3, we transported the creatures into the "intelligent" planet called Earth, in my opinion, the weakest sector of the whole Illuminati. If you want more information about these creatures first hand, contact me via Google+ or teleportating to the hyperdimension in Class-A.

While I still perfer the original, Half-Life 2 is a damn good game. I love the setting and atmosphere, the levels feel well desinged to accommodate the mechanics and the weapons, the scripted events add to the gameplay and atmosphere, all the weapons feel good to shoot and have there own use, the game never feels too repetitive, the graphics were good for the time it came out, the story while a little cliché is very well told and makes me feel like i'm actually there, and on top of all that the game has a pretty decent length, around 15-20 hours. Now obviously, the game has some issues, all games do, after all no game is perfect, However in Half-Life 2 the positive vastly outweigh the negative. 

I'm not a big fan of vehicle sections it's not that there bad they just overstay there 
welcome, also the lack of variation in enemies is kinda lame, sure the antlions, headcrabs, zombies and combine are cool, but the orginial Half-Life had more unique enemies like the Bullsquid and the Houndeye. Also the puzzles in Half-Life 2 are kinda underwhelming, there are less then the original, and are easy to solve. The only other complaint I have is that the ending is kinda weak, which is a sadly a fault both Half-Life's have. besdies that, Half-Life 2 is a great game with good replay value that I can't wait to plat again, and the faults are so minor that there easy to overlook.

If I had to give it a numerical score i'd say that's it's a 9/10. Please do yourself a favor and play all the Half-Life games, you'll be glad you did.

이 게임을 사는 것을 정말로 추천한다. 왜냐하면 전작의 사골처럼(아니면 사골보다도 더하게) 우려먹는게 가능한 점을 그대로 계승하여  moddb에서 combine combat같은 무료 모드들 다운받아서 실컷 할수 있기 때문이다.(게다가 이건 저작권 침해도 아니다! 이 얼마나 좋은가?)  이 게임의 시리즈는 정말로 게임이 아니라 게임기라는 말이 정말로 이상하게 느껴지지 않는다. 즉 그만큼 모드로 실컷 우려먹을수 있다는 것이다. 마치 게리 모드의 에드온이 셀수 없을것 같이 많다는 점과도 비슷하게 이 게임의 모드도 거의 셀 수 없이 많다. 이 게임을 실컷 우려먹게 도와주는 여러 모드 제작진들과 mob database, 그리고 밸브에게 정말로 감사하는 바이다.


하여간 본론으로 가자면, 전에 나온 게임답지 않게 그래픽도 많이 안좋진 않고 중사양 컴정도면 아마도 쾌적하게 잘 돌아간다.
게다가 Heroes and Genarals인가 뭔가 하는 게임을 돌리면 그래픽카드가 블루스크린을 토해내며 뻗어버리는 그래픽 카드로도 이 게임은 잘만 돌아간다! 이 얼마나 좋은가! 난이도는 사람마다 다르게 느끼겠지만, 적어도 나는 조금 어렵다. 그래도 할만한 난이도다. 그리고 버그는 본적이 없는것 같다.

[u][b] What is it? [/b][/u]

Half-Life 2 follows the story of Gordon Freeman after the catastrophic events that took place in Half-Life. An oppressive army called the Combine has invaded Earth and (as always) the rebels choose the protagonist as their leader. We shoot (and crowbar) our way through enemy soldiers and aliens in a first-person manner. Although it is commonly regarded as an FPS (the genre-defining one), I always thought it contained elements of horror in it.

[u][b] Pros [/b][/u]
[list]
[*] Fantabulous Gunslinging Gameplay - as I mentioned before, the Half-Life series is considered to be the pioneer of modern day FPS's and even though I have played many of them, this one just takes my breath away
[*] Eye-Melting Graphics - I CANNOT believe that such a captivatingly beautiful game came out in 2004. The graphics also help in creating a tense atmosphere at times.
[*] Newtonian Physics - The Source Engine's physics are so realistic from the ragdolls to the water and the items lying about, everything is interactable with
[*] Challenging Difficulty - Even on Easy difficulty, this game gave me quite a challenge (maybe I'm just really bad) and the puzzles often require brain-wracking.
[*] Absorbent Atmosphere - By this I mean that everything in the game works so good together, from the soundtrack to the story to the graphics, you feel like you are actually present at the scene. Very few games achieve this.
[/list]

[u][b] Cons [/b][/u]
[list]
[*] I cannot give you even a single con.
[/list]

[u][b] Verdict [/b][/u]

Half-Life 2 is one of the best games I have ever played and it is a must have for everyone who even remotely enjoys entertainment. Tell your family to stop wasting time on Glee and start playing this. Well it isn't exactly a family-friendly game - it has violence and blood and some disturbing images. But that is actually one of the main things that keeps the action going and makes the game realistic (I mean, honestly, what would be the fun of a first-person shooter if you couldn't shoot people?) I absolutely love this game and it is truly, in every sense of the word, a masterpiece.

10/10

STOP DO NOT READ THIS COMMENT

JUST BUY THE GAME

This game is sort of lackluster when compared to the freshness and originality of the first Half-Life, and the amazing masterpiece that is Half-Life 3, but so much important plot happens in this game that you'll be lost if you play Half-Life 3 without playing this first.  Go through this game as fast as possible, skip all the easter eggs, hidden caches, and side puzzles, and just power on through to the cutscenes so you know what happens to lead up to Half-Life 3.

Its like sex but without the sense of achievement

When I first played Half-Life 2 it shocked me. It had such a robust and plentiful story, neat characters, unique enemies, and it was SO LONG of a campaign. It truly is a masterpiece of games, paving the way for more infamous games, one such as G-Mod. The one thing I would really have wanted more out of the game at times was a compass or some map marker, but it didn't need it. IT DID NOT NEED IT. Half the fun in this game is going one direction and finding out what lies in store. Is it some ammo? The actual path? Multitudes of things wanting to eat your pretty face? I don't know, and neither do you.

Half Life 2, in my opinion, is the greatest PC game of all-time.  Every single aspect of this game is amazing, and Valve's efforts in crafting it still stand the test of time 10 years later.  I've never played a game with this much atmosphere, amount of amazing characters, well-engineered gameplay, and amount of unique levels that I will never forget.  Some of the scenes in this game blow me away with their simplistic yet beautiful accents (Highway 17 comes to mind).  And even if HL2 looks a little dated, the community's new update flawlessly remasters the graphics (without changing the looks of things that matter 'characters, structures, etc.').  So get the update, and play through one of Steam's best titles.
